1.content:
It was just another day for Amy and the rest of her family. The young teen girl was talking to her parents on the phone, while relaxing in her room, Watching some YouTube videos and all. "Yeah yeah, don't worry, everyone will be fine. I mean, you trust me right? So, you have my word." She said. "Alright, love ya, have fun!" She shut her phone off, and sighed. "Man, they are never gonna leave me alone about this." Today was the first time that Amy was in charge of the house, babysitting her younger siblings, and her parents wouldn't stop calling and asking if they were ok. "I'm a big girl, I can take care of my little sister and brothers. What's the worst that can happen?"

Perhaps she was right, after all, her younger brothers were playing video games in their rooms, and her little sister was playing in her room alone. All she had to do was check on them to see if they were ok. Everything seemed like it was going ok.

Right outside of their house however, was a buzzing fly of some kind. Only it wasn't a fly, it was a very tiny spaceship, no bigger than a housefly. Two strange alien creatures were inside the spaceship. They didn't speak in our language, yet they were here for a reason. Their species has just built a growth ray in their spaceship, and they are on a mission to test it on earthlings, to see it's effects on humans. The plan? To destroy the planet with the help of enlarged humans going on rampages. It just so happens that this household will be the first of their experiments.

The aliens noticed a open window, which led to...
1.title: Just Another Day

choices: One of her friends comes to visit
11.content:
We now go into the room of the girl who is in charge of the house, Amy. Amy's room is any typical teenager girl's room with boy band posters, girly stuff, and all sorts of other stuff that you can possibly imagine these days. We also see Amy in the room trying out several bikini outfits as she is posing for a model for her page on facebook. From the look of Amy, she has a sharp ass and big breasts, and the bikini makes her even more sexy. Perhaps the aliens want to have a sexy girl rampaging.

However, the laser did hit Amy right then and there, and she begun to glow some colors. But she didn't pay any attention to it at all for the time being. The aliens then realized that they had a laser malfunction, and that can only mean one thing, something off is going to happen to the girl in some way.

"Oh yeah, the kids are alright, they never pose any trouble at all, but Daisy is easily the best out of the kids at the house and I invited her for this sleepover tonight with us and her friends." Amy said in her phone just as she brushes her hair all while in her sexy pink bikini. "Well thanks, and with your parents changed plans to heading out for the weekend, this is really easy for you... so why not we come by here tonight."

However, just as she was going to answer, she then suddenly freezes right in site. She also drops her phone during that time, and then something begins to happen to her. The phone said "Amy... you still there?"

1113.content:
She is still frozen for a few more moments, but she started to suddenly feel very odd and weird, then it happened. Suddenly she started to notice the world around here was growing right around her, and not only that, surprisingly her pink bikini still shrunk with her as well. She was starting to panic and gasped just as she continue to shrank until she was a half a inch tall. Her height alone would now barely reach the phone, and by the time the freezing stopped, she realized that the entire world has grown, and that she has shrunk to the size of a bug. She then screams in total horror.

"Amy... you there.... Hello?" Her phone still said, but to the height of the now shrunk Amy, it was loud to her ears. She then screamed out to her "I am still here... but something really bad has happened to me...." she said, but then suddenly the phone was then cut off, and Amy screamed "Oh no...." she gasped in horror as she realized that no one will be able to help her at all. "I cannot believe what just happened to me, I just shrank to the size of a bug... what am I am going to do?" She sighed just as she starts to loose hope, but then suddenly, the ground starts to rumble around her, and it was heavy. It then sounded like one of the kids that she was watching, and Amy could only hope someone can help her. The door then soon opened and revealed to be...

It was Daisy who for some reason was only in her panties.

"Dam it Amy just cause I'm only in training bras doesn't make it ok to keep hiding them"

Next

Just as they fire though Daisy enters the room wearing a 2 piece bikini and stepped into the beams path unknowingly.

"Fun fact little sis boys don't like small frys and I don't think you'll be getting your crushes attention anytime soon"

Blushing and red in the face an angry Daisy retorted
"You overconfident slut just you wait I won't be small forever" and she started to stomp off.

The irony of the fight would soon come to light though.
The aliens casually observed as they examined their device.


Daisy heads to the nearby secluded lake still fuming.
She was still in her new bikini.

"Stupid sister thinks tits are everything. I'd just be happy for a little extra height.
For now this is the best I can do to get Dan's attention. He said he likes tall girls but also girls that wear bikinis unashamed to show some leg and belly"


Sure Dan was 3 years older but maybe just maybe if they could start a relationship he'd wait for her.

I really hope mom and dad don't find out.. They'll kill us.." Max sighed, really worried, more about being in trouble then the city their younger siblings were heading for!

So please, tell us, what happened? "

just... Oh... I don't know!!" Amy started to feel her stomach tingle.. "Look, I don't wanna be here.. don't feel so good.." Amy and Max were in dire shock as was the rest of the neighborhood nearly everyone on the block was out of their homes from parents to the kids many of them in the same grades as the two current giant and giantess looking up in shock yet the expressions on Daisy and Tony's face was hard to make out mainly due to their very faces were so incredibly high no one except for a bird or plane flying nearby could tell but they didn't have to ponder for long as Daisy spoke up first "T-Tony what happened to us?" "Uh oh!" She nodded swallowing hard

"PLAYTIME!!" What happens now?

1411.title: A Big Tourist Attraction Now

choices: Max's idea, Getting Daisy's attention by poking and...licking her titanic toes
Attempting to climb Daisy's massive sweaty toes or foot
Hoping that Daisy checks between her toes for her missing siblings
14111.content:
Daisy shook her head a bit. She snapped out of her growing stupor and smiled as she looked down. People were gathering, a few houses down, probably out of fear of the preteen giantess. Daisy waved at them with a happy expression, she didn't quite realize how intimidating her new size was. In fact to her, she likely thought they'd be just excited as she was about her growing. She lifted her foot again and was a bit more careful, seeing how her titanic feet were capable of a lot of destruction. She knew who she wanted to see her like this, and turned back towards her house. She bent down and called out into her house "Ammmmmy! Come out!" She shouted. People covered their ears as her voice was louder than ever.

Hearing a terrifying call for her Amy got outside as quickly as she could. She almost knocked Max and Tony out of the way as she were glued to the back door looking up at their massive sister. Amy told them both to stay inside as she left, and it seemed to have worked, the two promised they would stay inside. Amy opened the door and took her first steps outside and into the colossal shadow of her little sister.

Daisy waved down. "Look Sis! I finally got taller!" Daisy said as she began to twirl a bit. Amy couldn't take her eyes off of Daisy's massive feet, just hoping the young girl would be careful with each of her crushing steps. The ground was torn up by the force her feet placed on the grass, but strangely enough her pale feet remained clean looking, at least from the grass.

Amy put up her hands and tried to get Daisy to stop. "H-Hold on! I'm happy for you" She lied, this was a nightmare come true! Her annoying little sister now had the power of literal godzilla. She just hoped this was reversible. "B-But, have you thought of... Well shrinking back down?"

Daisy stopped twirling, and frowned. Looking down at Amy she spoke, "Why would I want that? Being big is so cool! I can see the mall from here and everyone's so little and cute!"

"Yes but you can't fit into the mall!" Amy pointed out. "Listen, how did you get so big? We need to figure out how to fix you!"

"I dunno, I just started growing when I came outside." Daisy admitted. She saw her two brothers coming out and waved to them with a smile as well. Amy saw this and turned around behind her to scold the two.

Naturally they ignored Amy and were more focused on Daisy and her now giant body. Max shouted up to Daisy, "Woahhh how'd you get so big!?"

"Yeah I wanna grow too!" Tony said. He looked up to Amy as he said this. "Please can I grow too? I'm a boy so I'll get even bigger than her!"

Amy looked at her younger brother and shook her head somewhat frantically. "No! You can't grow, no one can! And even if you could, who knows if you'd be bigger than her?"

"Yeah! I wanna be the biggest! You can be... as big as my toe!" Daisy added from high above. Amy sighed and face-palmed as her siblings were, in her eyes taking this situation far too lightly.

While all this silly conversation was happening, the aliens in their little ship were flying around Daisy and examining her. They floated around her head, the size of a city to them. The ship got close and landed on her cheek. Of course, at her size she couldn't feel the microscopic ship on her. Her hand slapped her cheek, but they were safe as her fingers were so big to them that they could easily fit in her fingerprints. The aliens stopped the beam and as her hand moved away they flew away to observe the effects.

Unconsciously her foot lifts as her stance widens in order to keep balance as she holds her head appearing a bit dizzy.

"How do you know that?" Amy asked her little brother.

"It happened last time. She turned green and then biiiiiiig!" He said smiling.

Amy took the hands of her two little brothers and began to run away from Daisy. The 11 year old girl let out a moan as she began to hug herself. Whatever was happening she seemed to like the feeling. She smiled and began to explode in size. Her feet dug up the ground as they expanded and crushed anything in their path. Cars and people fled from the area as the 100ft tall preteen grew and grew. It seemed as though there would be no end. She kept moaning to herself as her body felt amazing.

It took a few minutes for her to stop growing, and she grew so much that her once small feet now had crushed half of her home. Her toes were barely fitting inside her home and her ankle was 3 times as tall as it once stood. She opened her eyes and could see so much! She had to be at least a few thousand feet tall! She looked down at where her siblings were, but realized that her titanic foot now covered that spot. She wanted to be worried but for some reason the idea that they might be trapped under her massive foot was actually very exciting to her. Her bikini had grown with her so she had no shame about everyone watching. She called down, her voice was as powerful as thunder, but somehow understandable and feminine. "Sis? Are you guys down there?" She asked.

During her growth spurt, Amy took the boys and ran for the house. She heard the moans and the ground creaking under the growing weight of her little sister. She cursed her luck, knowing this would be her problem if it didn't kill her. The boys eventually began to run on their own, giving Amy a bit of a break as they got to the house. Before long she saw that Daisy, while not moving was going to hit the house just by growing! Her feet were dozens of feet look now, and she didn't look like she was gonna stop. Max seemed to be entranced by his growing little sister and Amy had to snap him out of it. They ran around the house in hopes they would avoid the growing girl. It sort of worked, for a bit. The house was partially destroyed by Daisy's toes and eventually the toes crept towards them. Daisy's little movements curling her toes as she experienced this pleasure were catastrophic for them, tossing debris and threatening to crush them. Amy didn't know what to do, but thankfully, Max took the initiative this time. He took Amy and Tony's hands and ran them between Daisy's toes. Amy went along with it, having no other ideas, but it became very very apparent that while this growth spurt was making her bigger, she was also profusely sweating.

The space between Daisy's toes was humid and smelled awful. Amy coughed a bit and tried not to gag at this powerful foot odor she had never smelled from the preteen girl before. Tony seemed uncomfortable, but being a young boy it didn't bother him much. Max on the other hand was actually blushing. He seemed to be enjoying this scent. Amy was confused but she found his idea to not be so bad, Daisy kept growing but they were mostly safe as long as they kept walking away from the expanding toe gap. Daisy's toes protected them from the debris of the house and they could still see as light came in from the top. Surely her feet had crushed neighbor's houses, but at least they were safe. Before long the small trio was covered in Daisy's toe sweat, but they endured. As Daisy stopped growing she sighed and looked around. The group was signaled by Daisy asking about their well being, or at least that's how Amy interpreted her call out.

"Yes! We're between your third and fourth toes! Don't move till we get out!" Amy called out. Daisy didn't respond. Amy was worried, if Daisy didn't feel them then she might move her foot to look for them, they could be crushed by mistake! She panicked and tried to think of a solution.

Max, blushing again said, "W-Well... We might be able to get her attention if we... yknow... mess around with her toes? Poke them, lick them, stuff like that." He looked away.

Amy looked confused, but then put two and two together. "Are you telling me you ran us between Daisy's toes just because you have a thing for her feet!?"

Max couldn't respond for a bit. Tony laughed a little and from her 3rd toe grabbed a massive drop of toe sweat in his hands and threw it at Max. He laughed as he effectively splashed Max with Daisy's toe sweat. Max chased Tony and Tony ran. It seemed to Amy as though they forgot they were risking their lives between the massive sweaty toes of a couple thousand foot tall 11 year old girl.

She realized she needed to decide what to do.

info.brief_description: When Amy's Parents leave her in charge of the house, the whole family has growing problems
info.description:
In this interactive story, Amy is a 15 year old girl who's the oldest in her family. She has two younger brothers, and one sister. Her parents are away on a trip to the city for a nice dinner. They left her in charge of the house. Sounds like a simple afternoon for the kids, doesn't it?

Perhaps it sounds simple, but things go very wrong when Aliens decide to use her and the rest of her family as Guinea pigs in their growth ray experiments, making things a whole heck of a lot harder for her, and the rest of the world too!

The main characters in the story are as follows:
Amy: 15 year old girl who is put in charge of her house. Likes to think of herself as responsible and more mature than the rest of her family.
Tony: 9 year old younger brother, he's a hyperactive little guy who is the most immature of the family. Likes to have fun, and doesn't care about anything!
Daisy: 11 year old younger sister. She's always annoyed by her older sister and just wants to be treated as mature, even though she's young, she loves to tease her older sister!
Max: 13 year old younger brother. Max is just a boy who likes to tease his younger brother, while ignoring his sisters.

There are a few rules, as shown here:
1. Nobody from the family can die
2. When growing, you can decide if their clothes grow or not, but if their clothes do not grow, please let their underwear grow with them at least.
3. Other characters can grow, such as say, a friend of one of the siblings. But please do not create any other brothers or sisters.
info.pretty_title: Attack of The Amazing Colossal Family
